name: Mad USD
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: The first hybrid CDP and partially collaterised stablecoin platform: Mad USD (MUSD). The MUSD token uses 2 stabilising + minting mechanisms that provides backing for the MUSD token. The MUSD token can be used just like any other traditional stablecoin.
